reviewText: same person as the tv show
Its impossible not to love this show. Its so amazing to see how everyday things are made! My husband and i are hooked!
Great and informative video. Highly recommended.

This is a series of factory tours covering a staggering variety of products, from aluminum cans to window glass to fire engines.  Fascinating to see the methods and tooling used to manufacture things.  Each product is allotted a brief 10 minute segment. Some products are simple, but others could use more time and detail.  We have all the seasons available, and when the next is released we'll get that too!
I didn't realize how many episodes each disk had. Pleasantly surprised. You have about 12-15 episodes per disk and there are 5 disks. Very pleased.

I love to watch these shows because it really entertains my mind and I learn how it is made.
I loved it on pay TV when I could afford it now I can watch them over.
arrived on time, would definitely buy again

same as above for seasons 5 & 6, wish I could order all the seasons on dvd, not on streaming, I love having my dvd collection in case for some reason I don't have the hulu streaming svc which currently has how its made on
A good seller, came in good time.  A very good, interesting series.  With all the trash on TV today this series certainly is a bright spot!!!
With nothing of interest on TV, we love this series.
I love this series. I'm addicted to seeing how stuff is made, both in small businesses and massive factory settings.
My 4 year old son loved this on Netflix. So sad they stopped playing it we had to buy it.
excellent insight into our complex world
My family loves How It's Made and it is pretty hard to find on disc. This collection is wonderful and the quality it great.
